snippet.title: Splatterhouse - PS3/X360 - 2010 E3 Trailer
snippet.description:
After a long wait, this Exclusive Preview Trailer, made especially for the E3 2010, has finally been revealed for your viewing! 

Have no Fear, Splatter Rick is Here!!!!

Check out how Rick is transformed from neat geek to gorey & blood-thirsty man-monster. More blood and guts are checked in this latest video for all the West Mansion Fans.

Splatterhouse is due for release in Fall 2010. 

Join Rick and friends on Splatterhouse's official:
- Facebook Fan Page: http://www.facebook.com/splatterhousegame
- Website: http://splatterhousegame.com

Check out your local Namco Bandai website for more information on our other titles: http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/
